entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
